docs.lead_paragraph: THE following reviews of the One Hundred Best Books of the Year are given in accordance to the classification decided upon by Prof. John Erskine, Dr. H.R. Steeves, Dr. Carl Van Doren, the committee for THE NEW YORK TIMES BOOK REVIEW from the Department of English, Columbia University.
